title: Creative Director (Content + Video Editor)
job_overview:
I’m looking for a Creative Director (Content + Editor) to help scale my online fitness coaching brand by doubling our content output, improving quality, nailing our message, and delivering fully edited, posting-ready videos.
ABOUT ME
I run a coaching business helping men in the mining/FIFO industry transform their bodies and lives. Our content needs to be real, relatable, motivating, and direct, speaking to working men who want to lead with confidence and purpose.

WHAT YOU’LL DO:
? Ideate and plan content (Reels are the priority).
? Write finalized, filming-ready scripts and talking points.
? Craft strong hooks, captions, and CTAs.
? Batch weekly content plans with 2+ weeks of material ready at all times.
? Research competitors, trends, and platform best practices.
? Maintain the content calendar in Notion.
? Edit video content to deliver polished, engaging Reels, ads, and social posts.
? Work directly with me (and VA) to ensure brand voice and message is perfect.

CONTENT TYPES:
Reels (priority)
Carousels
Static images
Ads

GOALS:
? Increase to 7–14 posts/week.
? Improve quality and engagement.
? Grow reach and connection with our audience.

YOU NEED:
? Strong content strategy experience.
? Excellent English copywriting skills (hooks, captions, CTAs).
? Proven video editing skills for short-form social content.
? Ability to match and refine brand voice.
? Comfort using Notion or similar planning tools.
? Experience researching trends and competitors.
? Bonus if you know the fitness industry or personal development.

WORK DETAILS:
Part-time, remote.
Flexible hours (a few hours/day).
AUD $1200–1500/month (based on experience).
Long-term role with growth potential.
